Brother-captain.name: Brother-captain

unit.name: Hammerhand (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. Eye of Judgement (Psychic): Each time this model makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll .

Brother-captain.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brother-Captain This model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

Brotherhood Champion.name: Brotherhood Champion

unit.name: Clarion of Haste (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced . Inspiring Exemplar: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model in the Fight phase , you gain 1CP and until the end of the battle, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its Nemesis force weapon.

Brotherhood Champion.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Purgation Squad Strike Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brotherhood Champion This model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

Brotherhood Chaplain.name: Brotherhood Chaplain

unit.name: Zealous Path
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit. Litanies of Sanctity: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly GREY KNIGHTS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

Brotherhood Chaplain.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brotherhood Chaplain This model is equipped with: storm bolter; crozius arcanum.

Brotherhood Librarian.name: Brotherhood Librarian

unit.name: Sanctic Hood
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks . Haloed in Soulfire (Psychic): While this model is leading a unit, that unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

Brotherhood Librarian.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brotherhood Librarian This model is equipped with: Nemesis force weapon; Vortex of Doom.

Brotherhood Techmarine.name: Brotherhood Techmarine

unit.name: Techmarine
unit.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE units, this model has the Lone Operative ability. Blessing of the Omnissiah: In your Command phase , you can select one friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds and, until the start of your next Command phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll . Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn. Guardians of the Machine: Each time an enemy unit ends a charge move within Engagement Range of one or more GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE units from your army and within 6" of this model’s unit, you can target this model’s unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

Brotherhood Techmarine.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Purgation Squad Purifier Squad Strike Squad
led_by: Purgation Squad Purifier Squad Strike Squad
can_lead: Purgation Squad Purifier Squad Strike Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brotherhood Techmarine This model is equipped with: forge bolter; grav-pistol; Omnissian power axe; servo-arm.

Castellan Crowe.name: Castellan Crowe

unit.name: Champion of the Order of Purifiers (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Purifying Flame weapons equipped by models in that unit. Foresight (Psychic): Each time this model makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll .

Castellan Crowe.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following unit: Purifier Squad
default_wargear: 1 Castellan Crowe – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Purifying Flame; storm bolter; Black Blade of Antwyr.

Grand Master.name: Grand Master

unit.name: Warrior Strategist
unit.description: Once per battle round , one model from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP. Might of Titan (Psychic): Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by this model.

Grand Master.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Grand Master This model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

Grand Master In Nemesis Dreadknight.name: Grand Master In Nemesis Dreadknight

unit.name: Surge of Wrath (Psychic)
unit.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll , you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll. Warrior Strategist: Once per battle round , one model from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

default_wargear: 1 Grand Master in Nemesis Dreadknight This model is equipped with: dreadfists.

Grand Master Voldus.name: Grand Master Voldus

unit.name: Sanctuary (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll . Hammer Aflame (Psychic): Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound ; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

Grand Master Voldus.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Grand Master Voldus – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Searing Purity; storm bolter; Malleus Argyrum.

Venerable Dreadnought.name: Venerable Dreadnought

ranged.name: Heavy plasma cannon – supercharge blast hazardous

unit.name: Guidance of the Ancients (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a GREY KNIGHTS model from your army makes an attack that targets that unit, add 1 to the Hit roll .

default_wargear: 1 Venerable Dreadnought This model is equipped with: assault cannon; storm bolter; Dreadnought combat weapon.

Brother-captain Stern.name: Brother-captain Stern

unit.name: Exemplar of the Silvered Host
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, on a Critical Wound , the target suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage. Strands of Fate (Psychic): The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

Brother-captain Stern.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Brother-Captain Stern – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force sword.

Kaldor Draigo.name: Kaldor Draigo

unit.name: Untouchable Purity
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds . One With the Warp (Psychic): Once per battle, when this model’s unit declares a charge in the same turn it was set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault ability, add 3 to the Charge roll .

Kaldor Draigo.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Brotherhood Terminator Squad Paladin Squad
default_wargear: 1 Kaldor Draigo – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Scourging; storm bolter; the Titansword.

Brotherhood Terminator Squad.name: Brotherhood Terminator Squad

unit.name: Force Edge (Psychic)
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack that targets a unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ), improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

unit.name: Ancient’s Banner
unit.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

unit.name: Apothecary’s Narthecium
unit.description: In your Command phase , if the bearer is not destroyed, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTERS ) to the bearer’s unit.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Brother-captain Brotherhood Chaplain Brotherhood Librarian Grand Master Grand Master Voldus Inquisitor Inquisitor Coteaz Inquisitor Draxus Inquisitor Greyfax Brother-captain Stern Inquisitor Eisenhorn Inquisitor In Terminator Armour Inquisitor Ostromandeus Kaldor Draigo

Strike Squad.name: Strike Squad

unit.name: Sanctifying Ritual (Psychic)
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

ranged.name: Twin heavy bolter sustained hits 1 twin-linked

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Fire Focus
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. The same enemy unit can only be affected by this ability once per turn.

default_wargear: 1 Razorback This model is equipped with: twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.
Razorback.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 6 GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport TERMINATOR models.
